text: CLOSE Fifth Harmony announced a “ hiatus ” to “ pursue solo endeavors. ” Time From left, Dinah Jane, Normani Kordei, Lauren Jauregui and Ally Brooke of Fifth Harmony perform a medley at the MTV Video Music Awards. ( Photo : Matt Sayles, Invision / AP ) It's time for the four women of Fifth Harmony — Dinah Jane, Ally Brooke, Normani Kordei and Lauren Jauregui — to sing their separate tunes. The girl group announced that they will be going on indefinite hiatus in a tweeted statement Monday from Fifth Harmony's official account. ` ` Reflecting on the past six years since we started on X - Factor, we've realized just how far we've come and we appreciate everything so
